mapper.select: SELECT oi.`goods_name`, oi.goods_num, oi.`price`, oi.price*oi.goods_num AS total FROM ${tableName_es_sss_order_goods_data} oi LEFT JOIN ${tableName_es_sss_order_data} o ON oi.order_sn = o.sn WHERE o.create_time >= #{startTime} AND o.create_time <= #{endTime} ORDER BY oi.`goods_id`

SELECT SUM(o.`order_price`) AS receive_money, SUM(r.`refund_price`) AS refund_money FROM ${tableName_es_sss_order_data} o LEFT JOIN ${tableName_es_sss_refund_data} r ON o.`sn` = r.`order_sn` WHERE o.create_time >= #{startTime} AND o.create_time <= #{endTime}
